member.name: P:Genetec.Sdk.Workspace.Maps.MapDesignerAttribute.IsFixedRatio
member.summary:
Gets a flag indicating if the item can be resize with a fixed size ratio.
This applies to the map object's adorner rendered in the map editor. The actual size of the content of the custom must be handled in it's implementation. If the map object is represented by an , is a good fit with fixed ratio, while goes well if a fixed ratio isn't enforced.
If using IsFixedRatio, avoid setting the width and height of the content of the custom so it can be handled by the map editor.
